text: John Barrasso (born July 21, 1952) is the senior United States Senator from Wyoming. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since June 25, 2007. He was in the Wyoming Senate from 2003 to 2007. == Education == Barrasso was born on July 21, 1952 in Reading, Pennsylvania. He graduated from the Georgetown University. == Personal life == He was married to Linda Nix until they divorced. He was then married to Bobbi Brown from 2008 until her death in 2024. Barrasso has three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * John Barrasso, U.S. Senator for Wyoming, Home Page Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States senators from Wyoming Category:American physicians
title: John Barrasso
